pages.text: The third tab of the maid's GUI is the bauble inventory. This mod provides several baubles that can be triggered to protect the maid under certain conditions:$(li)Ultramarine Orb Elixir: 6 times to cancel the maid's death.$(li)Tombstone Bauble: Tombstones that generate preserved items when the maid dies.
$(li)Protect Bauble: When the maid receives the corresponding damage, the damage event is cancelled.
